name: Spotify
title: spotify.com
shortDescription: Spotify offers a vast library of music and podcasts accessible from anywhere. Catering to music lovers and podcast enthusiasts, it allows users to explore new and trending content across various genres. Users can sign up for free with occasional ads, or opt for a premium subscription for uninterrupted access. Ideal for everyday listening, workout playlists, or discovering new artists.
cons: Limited offline playback for free users

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Apple Music
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers exclusive content and high-quality audio

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Tidal
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focus on high-fidelity sound and video

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Deezer
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Wide range of features with unique Flow playlist
